product_name: BOBBI BROWNCrushed Lip Color Moisturizing Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingBobbi Brown Crushed Lip Color is a moisturizing lipstick formula that brings on a just-kissed, lip color effect in one swipe. Crushed pigments and lip-loving ingredients add wearable, feel-good lipstick that lasts all day.
details: DetailsBenefitsA satin-matte lipstick with the feel of a lip balm. Lip color glides on comfortably, leaves lips moisturized and kissably soft.Loaded with soft matte pigments for high color payoff and an un-lipstick lip stain effect.Rich in moisturizing Vitamins E and C and beeswax.Glides on like a lip balm, imparts a blotted-down, matte finish.Swipe once for a pigment-rich, lip stain effect, or more for full-coverage lip color.A hydrating formula to moisturize lips.Lasts and resists feathering for 8 hours.Key IngredientsCastor Seed OilVitamins C & EBeeswaxFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesGlutenSulfitesMineral OilTriclosanFormaldehydeItem 2583541How To UseSwipe lipstick on bare lips - buildable lipcolor formula delivers a blotted-down look with one swipe. Add two or three more coats for an even more intense lip color payoff. Follow with Crushed Oil-Infused Lip Gloss to add high-impact shine.IngredientsBabe: Ricinus Communis (castor) Seed Oil , Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride , Isopropyl Lanolate , Euphorbia Cerifera (candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla , Cetyl Lactate , Paraffin , Beeswax\Cera Alba\Cire D'abeille , Nylon-12 , Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline , Tocopherol , Ascorbyl Palmitate , Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate , Linalool , Limonene , Citral , Benzyl Benzoate , Geraniol , Fragrance (parfum) , [May Contain: Mica , Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891) , Iron Oxides (CI 77491) , Iron Oxides (CI 77492) , Iron Oxides (CI 77499) , Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985) , Red 7 Lake (CI 15850) , Manganese Violet (CI 77742) , Red 6 (CI 15850) , Red 7 (CI 15850) , Red 27 (CI 45410) , Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090) , Red 28 Lake (CI 45410) , Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140) , Red 22 Lake (CI 45380) , Carmine (CI 75470) , Red 21 (CI 45380) , Orange 5 (CI 45370) , Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe lipstick on bare lips - buildable lipcolor formula delivers a blotted-down look with one swipe. Add two or three more coats for an even more intense lip color payoff. Follow with Crushed Oil-Infused Lip Gloss to add high-impact shine.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla

reviews.headline: Keep repurchasing
reviews.comments: This is a perfect nudity pink that I think would look good on anyone. When I use it up, I replace it love it

reviews.headline: Soft and very moisturizing
reviews.comments: It is just perfect for s soft and natural look

reviews.headline: Formula changed :(
reviews.comments: I have been a faithfuk wearer of Bobbi Brown since 2011 when I first discovered the brand. Their lipstick used to be soooo moisturizinf and long lasting. Brownie was always my signature color. They stopped making it for a while, and I was so excited to see it come back! However, not only is it not as moisturizing, easy to apply (it used to glide right on), and long lasting, but it is a totally different color! I have searched far and wide for a color that compares and wears like the original. I wish they would bring it back. :(

reviews.headline: great color
reviews.comments: I'm quite apply with this color, Bare, a pinkish beige:  It's so hard to find lipsticks in this rosy colorway, but if anyone has it, Bobbie Brown will.  And it's a pretty nice lipstick in that it goes on smoothly and is comfortable to wear.  But it's typical Bobbie Brown:  It's the brand with the best the best colors, and for me, it always has been, but it's also typical that it doesn't last very long on the lips, and even with lip pencil, before long it looks like I've never had any lipstick on.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I usually don't use lipstick, but this product really works for me. It's almost like using a lip gloss.

reviews.headline: Telluride is a great color!
reviews.comments: I just tried this and love the color. It is a neutral but is a touch deeper than some pink browns and looks great. Smooth, natural looking.

reviews.headline: Perfect Summer color
reviews.comments: I love this lipstick I got it in color blush and its perfect to put on and go. Its smooth very sheer color. Will purchase again. Very smooth on lips not sticky at all. Love it

reviews.headline: My new favorite lipstick
reviews.comments: Genuinely, I had given up on lipstick completely. I found this brand's tinted lip balm, and fell in love so hard that I looked for what else was in store in lips, and when I saw the colors this brand had to offer? I HAD to try it. And to my UTMOST pleasure, the lipstick was absolutely wonderful. Everything other lipsticks wish they could be. The natural colors are to be adored, and the lipstick does not feel as cakey and thick as others have for me in the past. Also, the Ruby is the very first red that I've liked on myself, ever. The only bad thing I have to say is, I am sad I don't own all of them!

reviews.headline: Love this one!
reviews.comments: I am low key neutral kind of gal and this is beautiful to wear with a gloss on top.. got it in Italian Rose and it's beautiful onâ€¦ stays with a gloss I am not a touch up gal so it stays for my dayâ€¦

reviews.headline: I would not purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: Does not cover lips well.

reviews.headline: Would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Excellent product

reviews.headline: Gross/Pass
reviews.comments: I hate to say this but I just purchased this lipstick and it tastes so bad, almost like beef tallow. The scent is terrible. I'm not sure how people buy this. Also I got a new one thinking it went rancid and nope just nasty.

reviews.headline: Perfect "Just Been Kissed" Look
reviews.comments: This lipstick has a really buildable, sheer, color. I really like the natural finish. The only con is that it can be slightly drying, I just moisturize well overnight.

reviews.headline: Color babe
reviews.comments: Darker in perosn woups like to return it csnt get s salesperson to help

reviews.headline: Natural Looking While Delivering On Color
reviews.comments: I wanted a natural-looking lipstick that would still give my lips color. The formula is exactly what I wanted: more color payoff than a lip tint, but less than a classic creme. The formula is a little drier than I'd like, and is fairly matte. Overall it looks beautiful and I wear it daily to work. I'll be buying more shades.

reviews.headline: Would not buy this again
reviews.comments: When I put this lip stick on, it felt like I was smearing a crayon on my lips. It had a vey waxy feel to it. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: My favorite lipstick
reviews.comments: Beautiful, creamy colors.

reviews.headline: Feels like lip balm
reviews.comments: I have dry lips pretty much year round, and while I can keep them under control with good lip care at night, I still have to be careful with the formula of my lipstick. This formula goes on smoothly and feels like a lip balm. It's a sheer but buildable color payoff in a creamy but not glossy formula. Because it's balmy, it glides over and sort of smooths any roughness on my lips. It doesnt gather into lip lines or chapped areas, and just creates a pretty, subtle, smooth lip look. I bought the shade Blue Raspberry, and I love the shade. If you like a coolish dusty rose shade, this shade is worth checking out. Its not too cool, nor too deep. It's a "my lips but better" shade for me. (I'm light skin toned with neutral leaning cool undertones.) I took off one star simply because I do feel the price is a bit high for what this is. But I'm definitely happy to have splurged on this one and happy to have this in my collection.

reviews.headline: Love the color and formula
reviews.comments: Last all day everyday colo my favorite first time purchasing love the color Brownie

reviews.headline: Gorgeous color
reviews.comments: Goes on super smoothly and is light and wearable. I could forget I had lipstick on. The shade Lilac is stunning (almost a My Lips But Better but with a little extra kick). I layered it with a light pink in the middle and it rocked.

media.headline: Stain My Lips
media.caption: Bobbi girl crush event at work ðŸ’“ work hard play hard ðŸŒ·âœ¨ðŸ‘€

faceoff_positive.comments: I loved this new Crushed Lip Color from the moment I took it out of the box. The packaging is good looking and functional. The sleek black matte surface of the tube and the color band are striking but the real surprise is when you take off the lid. The tube color continues right to the lip color. No longer do I need to open each tube to find the color I want to wear. Genius. The formula of the lip color is sort of "crÃ¨me meets stain." It applies easily and feels creamy on the lips but is less opaque, like a stain. I have worn both Babe and Ruby and was pleased to see how both colors adapt to my medium-fair skin tone.
faceoff_positive.headline: WOW

faceoff_negative.comments:
TEXTURE: The product description says this lipstick has a "feel of a balm", so I was led to expect something more moisturizing that glides on your lips easily, perhaps like Fresh Sugar lip. In terms of moisture/ balminess, I find this lipstick to be actually below average. Not particularly drying, but not nearly as soothing as the website suggests.

COLOR: The pigments are quite nice, but Babe turned out to be way off "medium warm pink". It's simply just RED that really pops on your face, NOT an MLBB-tone as suggested by the description on the website. I guess this is a lesson that online purchases of lip products can be a gamble.
faceoff_negative.headline: Misleading descriptions: texture and color
